thread.title: Lakewood mobile home fire being investigated as arson
thread.title_full: Lakewood mobile home fire being investigated as arson | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Lakewood mobile home fire being investigated as arson
text:
Firefighters say a mobile home fire in Lakewood Friday morning is being investigated as an arson.
Two people were transported to the hospital with smoke inhalation after the mobile home in the 3200 block of 96th Street South caught fire from the outside.
West Pierce fire said firefighters tried to save two cats inside the mobile home, but they died in the fire.
Firefighters said the fire appeared to have started near a shed or carport. West Pierce fire and Lakewood police are investigating.
Most of the outside of the trailer was gutted by the flames.
UPDATE: this morning's mobile home fire in #Lakewood is being investigated as an arson by West Pierce & @LakewoodPD .
